snippet: “Lucio Fontana: Ambienti Spaziali” at the Gagosian Gallery reminds us that art-making is a process of research and striving, not only polished fait accompli.
abstract: Roberta Smith reviews works by Italian Modernist artist Lucio Fontana at the Gagosian Gallery in Chelsea.
lead_paragraph: “Lucio Fontana: Ambienti Spaziali” at the Gagosian Gallery reminds us that art-making is a process of research and striving, not only polished fait accompli.

headline.seo: ‘Lucio Fontana: Ambienti Spaziali’ at Gagosian in Chelsea
